snippet.title: "Flesh" (2018) ※First Minutes Gameplay※
snippet.description:
“Flesh is a dark fantasy game where you play as a mage who begins on a path to learn the secrets of necromancy. Journey through the broken world of Alma as you search for the powers locked within the human body.

What sort of mysteries will you uncover?”

"Flesh" is available at 
[ KA·IN WORKS - A Fantasy Simulation Project ]
https://fantasysimulation.com/flesh

[ Itch.Io ]
https://kainworks.itch.io/flesh

[ RMNet ]
https://rpgmaker.net/games/10774/

[GameJolt]
https://gamejolt.com/games/flesh/375237

[IndieDB]
https://www.indiedb.com/games/flesh

[Freem!]  
https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/20115

 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Made with RPG Maker 2003
©ENTERBRAIN, INC;

 Publisher
 Gotcha Gotcha Games

Inspired by the Famicase submission "Flesh" by
©Kleinman XOXO
https://kleinman.world
